title: Brand: AcuRite / Part #: 02047
body_html:
Item #: 67733238
Brand: AcuRite
Model #: 02047

Product Specifications

Measures Temperature; Humidity
Wifi Capability No
Lightning Detector No
Measures Indoor Temperature Yes
Anemometer No
Measures Indoor Humidity No
Moon Phases No
Minimum Temperature (C - 2 Decimals) -40.00
Minimum Temperature (Deg F - 3 Decimals) -40.000
Maximum Temperature C 70.00
Power Source (2) AA Batteries
Maximum Temperature (F) ( - 0 Decimals) 158.000
Minimum Humidity (Percent) 0
Maximum Humidity (Percent) 99
Temperature Accuracy +/- 2 F
Humidity Accuracy +/-4% from 10-20% RH; +/-3% from 20-80% RH; +/-4% from 80-90% RH; +/-5% from 90-99% RH; +/-5% from 0-10% RH
Display Type Color LCD
Display Width (Decimal Inch) 5.039
Display Height (Decimal Inch) 3.2480
Features Indoor Thermometer: Hot or cold sleeper? Know when to turn the air conditioning or heat on or off with an included indoor temperature reading; Valet Catchall Space: Place keys, loose change, or other trinkets on the valet pad for easy, on-the-go grabbing; plus, the Qi-certified charging pad recognizes non-chargeable devices for product longevity and advanced safety; Alarm Clock with Snooze: Wake up on time (or hit snooze to sleep in!) with fully charged devices and knowledge of today?s weather conditions; Personalized Weather Forecast: Data collected by the outdoor sensor combines with the in-display barometer measurements to provide a hyperlocal forecast 12 hours from your current conditions; Hyperlocal Weather Conditions: Included wireless outdoor sensor measures temperature and humidity and sends data to the easy-to-read indoor weather valet display; Auto-Dimming Display: The screen brightness automatically changes based on the time of day or can be personally adjusted to make this weather valet perfect for bedside, kitchen, living room, or rec room use; LCD Screen with Polycarbonate Lens: The sleek design features a textured backside and faux walnut finish that looks great alongside any desktop or tabletop furniture; AcuRite Weather Valet with Qi-Certified Wireless Charging Pad and Alarm Clock Wireless Charging Capability: Simply drop your Qi-equipped smartphone or earbuds case on the charging pad to safely charge these everyday devices, plus an on-screen indicator lets you know when your device is done charging
